job description:
SENIOR DATA SCIENTIST

Company: Primer Technologies, Inc.
Location: San Francisco, CA
Position Type: Full Time
Experience: See below for details
Education: See below for details
Senior Data Scientist (San Francisco, CA) : Contribute to core prod feats & key biz decisions, on distinctive commercial apps driven by machine learning algorithms, visual & cleaning; program in Python & work with data in a range of formats & from variety of sources; take lead on building prototypes; build on chosen available tools and models; utilize & implement wide variety of machine learning algorithms & improve machine learning algorithms' performance. Req MS degree + 3 yrs exp, or Ph.D. Apply by mail to Job #02PT, attn Lisa Lai, Primer Technologies, Inc., 244 Jackson St., 2nd Fl., San Francisco, CA 94111.
